page.title: 04FARMING IN OWERMOIGNE
page.content: {LIVESTOCK AND ARABLE FARMING}COVERS MOST OF OUR BLOCK.500 ACRES OF FARMLAND BELONG TO THE CREE FAMILY. 300 ACRES OF THIS IS LET AND USED FOR {DAIRY COWS AND BARLEY.}THE OTHER 200 ACRES IS RUN ON A PARTNERSHIP BASIS WITH THE CREES RETAINING THE LAND AND THE WOODSFORD ESTATE FARMS RUNNING THE FARM UNDER A FARM MANAGER.THIS FARM HAS{70 ACRES GRAZING GRASS/SILAGE,30} {ACRES SEED POTATOES,15 ACRES MAIZE,18} {ACRES LUCERN,25 ACRES BARLEY,40 ACRES} {WHEAT,130 FRESIAN HEIFERS} <REPLACEMENTS FOR WOODSFORD'S 2 DAIRY HERDS> AND{70 BEEF CATTLE.}ALL{7}FARMS IN OUR BLOCK WOULD APPEAR TO HAVE SIMILAR PROPORTIONS OF LIVESTOCK/CROPS/GRAZING AND ARE HIGHLY MECHANISED AND EFFICIENTLY RUN WITH LARGE QUANTITIES OF FERTILISERS AND SPRAYS BEING USED.
